Displaying an icon on a Button component using Ext JS

The following example shows how you can display an icon on an Ext.Button control by setting the icon property to a file path or a data URI.

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.0.7
  • Ext.Button
  • Ext.button.Button
  • button
  • icon
[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.button.Button Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.application({
    name: 'Ext.Array.clean()',
    launch: function () {
        Ext.create('Ext.Button', {
            text: 'I\'m a button!',
            icon: 'http://sencha.com/favicon.ico',
            renderTo: Ext.getBody()
        });
    } // launch
}); // Ext.application()
